Job Title: Value Engineer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Finance

Description:
Who we are: Mediafly is the leading revenue enablement platform market-facing teams use to plan, predict, coach, and engage at the highest levels. Our unified suite of solutions create immersive buyer experiences; enable sellers to lead with value, allow managers to scale coaching, and empower leaders to forecast with confidence. In today’s unpredictable market, Mediafly is the key to delivering predictable efficient growth.
Read this first (optional, but encouraged depending on the role): Research shows that while men apply to jobs when they meet an average of 60% of the criteria, women and other marginalized groups tend to only apply when they check every box. If you think you have what it takes, but don't necessarily meet every single point on the job description, please apply. We'd love to have a chat to see what skills/experiences you are able to bring to this team.
Mediafly is seeking a Value Engineer to support value optimization initiatives by analyzing processes, systems, and products to identify opportunities for cost reduction, quality improvement, and performance enhancement. The Value Engineer will work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to implement value engineering strategies and drive continuous improvement. This role requires an understanding of customer needs, industry trends, and competitive landscape to effectively position Mediafly’s value solution and drive revenue growth.
Responsibilities of a Value Engineer:Collaborate with clients to understand their business objectives, challenges, and analytics requirements.Conduct value discovery workshops with clients to uncover their business challenges, goals, and desired outcomes, and translate them into value-based solutions.Build strong relationships with key stakeholders, including business leaders, and Mediafly’s product teams.Develop comprehensive analytics strategies tailored to meet the specific needs and goals of each client aligned to the post-sales customer journey.Work closely with internal product managers and analysts to design and implement effective analytical models that are customer-friendly.Define and articulate the value proposition of analytics solutions, emphasizing the impact on business outcomes.Develop business cases and ROI analyses to demonstrate the potential return on investment for clients.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful implementation of the value solution, including teaching and training Customer Success Managers how to educate users on key analytics. Partner with sales teams to develop and execute value-based selling strategies, including value assessments, business value conversations, and executive-level engagement. Track and analyze key metrics and KPIs related to value engineering activities, such as win rates, deal sizes, and customer ROI, and provide insights and recommendations on continuous improvement. Troubleshoot and address any issues that may arise during the implementation phase.Stay up-to-date of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in analytics.Actively contribute to the development of reusable assets and methodologies.
We would love to work with you if you have: 4-7+ years of developing a career in Finance, Accounting, Corporate Finance, Investment Banking, Data and Analytics with a focus on dashboard development, implementation, customization, education, and training.Proven track record of success in driving revenue growth through value-based selling and solution positioning.Strong analytical and quantitative skills, with the ability to develop and present compelling ROI analyses and business cases. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex concepts in a clear and concise manner. Demonstrated leadership abilities, with experience in leading and mentoring teams.Strategic mindset with a customer-centric focus and a passion for driving customer success.Proficiency in data visualization tools and techniques.Experience with revenue enablement, sales effectiveness, or CRM software platforms is a plus.Strong Microsoft Excel knowledge.Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Data Science, Analytics, Engineering or related field, preferred.
Why Mediafly?Remote based in US & UKFlexible working hoursGenerous PTOCompetitive Salary401K Retirement Plan with matchingTransparent Career PathsMedical, Dental, Vision12 Paid HolidaysPaid Parental LeaveRemote Stipend

Professional development is a top priority here at Mediafly! Learn how we attract and retain top tech talent!
https://www.mediafly.com/blog/attract-and-retain-top-tech-talent-with-professional-development/
We have over 180 employees located globally. Thanks to our commitment to employee experience, Mediafly has been recognized as a Best Place to Work from Crain's, Inc. and BuiltIn. Mediafly welcomes people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives. We are an equal opportunity employer and encourage all interested individuals to apply.
Mediafly's HQ is based in Chicago, IL.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
